entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story. He is mentioned as someone who knows Diagon Alley very well.

entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: Diagon Alley is a location that Harry is familiar with, and he suggests going there to find something for Scabbers.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is Hermione's pet rat. Harry suggests checking if they have anything for Scabbers at Diagon Alley.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the main characters in the story and has a pet rat named Scabbers. Harry suggests that she can get her owl while they are at Diagon Alley.

entities.name: magical menagerie
entities.description: The Magical Menagerie is a location where Harry, Ron, and Hermione go to buy ice cream. It has cages with various magical creatures inside.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the main characters in the story. He goes with Harry and Hermione to the Magical Menagerie.

entities.name: owl
entities.description: Hermione's owl is mentioned as something she can get while they are at Diagon Alley.

entities.name: enormous purple toads
entities.description: The Magical Menagerie has a pair of enormous purple toads that are gulping wetly and feasting on dead blowflies.

entities.name: gigantic tortoise
entities.description: A gigantic tortoise with a jewel-encrusted shell is glittering near the window at the Magical Menagerie.

entities.name: poisonous orange snails
entities.description: The Magical Menagerie has poisonous orange snails that are oozing slowly up the side of their glass tank.

entities.name: fat white rabbit
entities.description: A fat white rabbit is mentioned as changing into a silk top hat at the Magical Menagerie.

relationships.description: Harry knows Diagon Alley very well, as mentioned in the text: 'Harry, who knew Diagon Alley very well by now'.
Harry is concerned about Scabbers and suggests checking if they have anything for him at Diagon Alley.
Hermione owns an owl, which she can get while they are at Diagon Alley, as mentioned in the text: 'and Hermione can get her owl'.
Harry and his friends visit the Magical Menagerie, as mentioned in the text: 'So they paid for their ice cream and crossed the street to the Magical Menagerie'.
Harry observes a pair of enormous purple toads at the Magical Menagerie, as mentioned in the text: 'A pair of enormous purple toads were gulping wetly and feasting on dead blowflies'.
Harry observes a gigantic tortoise with a jewel-encrusted shell at the Magical Menagerie, as mentioned in the text: 'A gigantic tortoise with a jewel-encrusted shell was glittering near the window'.
Harry observes poisonous orange snails at the Magical Menagerie, as mentioned in the text: 'Poisonous orange snails were oozing slowly up the side of their glass tank'.
Harry observes a fat white rabbit changing into a silk top hat at the Magical Menagerie, as mentioned in the text: 'A fat white rabbit kept changing into a silk top hat'.
